summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 47892, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of a public road or parkway over and across the Great Northern Railway Company's right-of-way connecting Golden Gardens Park property with Golden Gardens Bathing Beach; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land therefor and providing for the payment of the cost thereof", approved the 5th day of November, 1924.
